author: xinbenlv
content: Maybe this is the channel to ask the question, is there any channel to discuss BLS12-381 for use case of EOA?

author: ralexstokes
content: i think if anything we want to move towards smart contract wallets / account abstraction features where we don't need to worry about extending EOAs with bespoke functionality

author: ralexstokes
content: do you have a particular use case for EOAs that requires BLS12-381?
